attributes.review: I downloaded this app for educational information about our current election. This is not the information I asked for😡. The blatant lies, lack of inclusivity and the ATROCIOUS fake fan...big deal breaker. I was so mad I had to delete. As a Karen myself, I will be talking to your manager.
attributes.title: I hate it! 😡

attributes.review: This app makes my phone lag and it gives me so many unnecessary notifications I got this app so I can read the things that really matter but instead I got this HORRIBLE app that used up a lot of my space for NO REASON the WORST APP EVER I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE!🤮
attributes.title: TRASH APP🤮waste of my space😤😡🤬

attributes.review: When I got the app it said that I should be deported and than made my phone call ice so I would get deported but I hung up before it could answer than my pet hippo died of confusion and then my house blew up would not recommend this app.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This is a horrible app that is stealing my information and selling it to other companies. It told one of my friends to leave the country because she is Asian. This is because it assumed she had Covid-19 due to her race. This is not right and nobody should stand with it. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE APP. IT IS VERY RACIST, AND STEALS YOUR INFORMATION. DO NOT GET THIS APP.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS THE WORST

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, the apps developer came to my house, trashed my kitchen, kicked my dog, and curb stomped my baby. He grabbed me by the hair and pushed my face down my own toilet. I can still smell the sewer water. A horrible experience overall!
attributes.title: This app made me fear for my life!

attributes.review: This app was something that I didn’t want to hear about that one day and then I thought she had a lot to talk to me when I’m talking to you and then you texted him saying I don’t know 🤷🏽‍♀️ is a ugly day so I just don’t want to hear that
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app steals your info and exposes your search history and your bank and social security number as well as hack into all  accounts. He’s racist, sexist and homophobic. He looks like a inflated Cheeto puff and is afraid of children. Teens scared him into a bunker and ruined his rally. HE TRIES TO BRAINWASH YOU INTO THINKING YOUR A FROG AND/OR A RAT SO BEWARE HES EVIL AND COULD TRY AND TURN YOUR FAMILY INTO PECANS!!!
attributes.title: SO BAD AND HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app woke me up all night long, it was not content to rest on my home screen. Elderly white men shouting All Lives Matter! Kept rousing me from slumber. I can’t live this way! Do not download this app, it will steal your soul and you will forever live in the nether!!!!!!!!!’
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: The second i downloaded it, i got these weird pop ups on my phone saying “Donald Trump will eat your lice and steal your fridge.” I was terrified for my life. Don’t download it if you love your family. Please get it deleted I am begging the app store.
attributes.title: Please get this app deleted.

attributes.review: This thing crashes EVERYTIME I open it! And I think there’s some sort of bug or glitch because on the off chance it DOES load, a GIANT ORANGE pops up on the main screen! Absolutely ridiculous! -10/10 do not recommend!
attributes.title: Worst App!
